data.message: You need more plastic? Pay people to recycle the bottles that your company uses, people will recycle just to save money and people will respect coca cola whole heartedly

replies.message: Hi Cory, we’re committed to supporting any well-designed initiative that could improve recovering and recycling rates, including a deposit return scheme. Ultimately that decision must be led by Government but requiring many organisations, – public and private – to work in partnership.
So if you supported the idea of a deposit return scheme then would organise these to try to put in into action?
